script: There is a Town Hall in the center of my hometown.
Statue of Founder is a location in my home town, it is 3 KM, South from Town Hall.
About 4 km West of the Statue of Founder there is a Retail Area
About 1 km East of the Retail Area there is a Museum
About 3 km West of the Museum there is a Hospital
And finally there is Playground which is West from Hospital and 3 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from {origin} to {place} following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
(Just an example, if exact instructions are followed)
From Town Hall, go 3km South to Statue of Founder.
From Statue of Founder, go 4km West to Retail Area.
From Retail Area, go 1km East to Museum.
From Museum, go 3km West to Hospital.
From Hospital, go 3km West to Playground.
